page.title: 08My School
page.content: My name is Nicola Cundiff.I live in Sutton and go to Hollinhey.The school is in Rural surroundings with trees,flowers and shrubs around it. I am in the recorder group and the choir.There is also an small orchestra called the Sinfonia.There is an environmental studies area on an inside court which has flowering shrubs and two fish pools.We also have a nature trail within the school grounds which we use for many subjects.We have won the second division at football,are cross country champions in boys events last year and have a good netball team.I carried out a survey in May 1985 and found that14 children came to this school from Macclesfield,95 from Sutton,39 from Lyme Green and 33 from Langley.We have four teams named Brindley, Hollinshed, Tunnicliffe, and Whiston.
